name: Snapsheet, Inc.
description: Developer of claims management software designed to transform the end-to-end claims process through digitization and intelligent automation. The company's software offers electronic intake of FNOL, data investigation, technology-assisted investigation, claims assessment, and digital payment processing for settlements, enabling companies to have access to cloud-native services in claim settlement processes.
one_liner: Developer of claims management software designed to transform the end-to-end claims process through digitization and intelligent automation. The company's software offers electronic intake of FNOL, data investigation, technology-assisted investigation, claims assessment, and digital payment processing for settlements, enabling companies to have access to cloud-native services in claim settlement processes.
